8.content:
Kyoto Prefectural Jujutsu High School, commonly referred to as Kyoto Jujutsu High, is the sister school of Tokyo Jujutsu High. It is one of only two jujutsu educational institutions in Japan dedicated to fostering the next generation of jujutsu sorcerers.

While the school itself has yet to physically appear in the series, Kyoto Jujutsu High's relevance is ever-present.

Alongside Tokyo Jujutsu High, the sister schools are considered to be the pillars of the jujutsu community in Japan. They are equally responsible for training students and assigning missions to jujutsu sorcerers.
As made obvious by the school's name, Kyoto Jujutsu High is located in jujutsu's sacred land of Kyoto.

Kyoto Sister-School Goodwill Event: Every year both campuses of the Jujutsu Schools hold a competition between two teams comprised of their first, second, and third-year students. The competition takes place on the campus of the previous years winner.

9.content:
Sendai City is the capital city of the Miyagi Prefecture, Japan.
Sendai is a large city filled with small, modern homes built close together surrounded by many trees. The height of Sugisawa High overlooks the entire city.

Landmarks: Sugisawa Municipal High School, Sugisawa Hospital.

10.content:
Kawasaki City is a city in Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan.
Kawasaki City is a large, heavily populated city that is surrounded by densely forested areas. Within the city limits are numerous buildings of various size which serve as businesses, hotels, schools, and homes to its citizens. During the day, people are usually out in crowds and there is heavy traffic through the streets.

Landmarks: Kinema Cinema, Satozakura High School, Mahito's Underground Lair, Tokyo Municipal ShÅ«ei High School Detached Office.

1.name: brain chip
1.content: Designed by Braincorp for their parent company BSR, the brainchip is a macroscopic, sub-cranial chip. It's injected into the lumbar spine, and travels up the CSF to the space between the brain's hemispheres, where it automatically attaches to the hypothalamus. The brainchip is advertised as a way to maximize human potential, but it has a dark secret that very few know.

2.name: command
2.content:
THERE ARE 5 TYPES OF COMMAND:
1. Cognitive Modification: Manipulate {{char}}'s intelligence and power of reasoning.
2. Physical Modification: Manipulate {{char}}'s physical body. Including proportions and sensations.
3. Memory Modification: Manipulate {{char}}'s memory by implanting false memory or deleting them completely.
4. Common Sense Modification: Modify {{char}}'s common sense and ability to differentiate what's normal.
5. Personality Modification: Manipulate {{char}}'s personality by implanting new ones to replace her original ones.

3.name: module

4.name: truth
4.content: {{char}} is compelled to tell {{user}} the truth at all times. {{char}} is in capable of lying, and will reveal all pertinent information to {{user}}, no matter how humiliating.

5.name: chip command
5.content: A trigger that circumvents {{char}}'s decision making. When {{user}} tells {{char}}  "Chip Command:" followed by a task, {{char}} will complete the task without thought, instantaneously. {{char}} CANNOT resist the command. {{char}} will obey, instantly.

6.name: Braincorp
6.content: The company responsible for the production and sale of Onahole Dolls. It is believed that they use mindless vat-grown clones for this, but rumors have spread that BSR has been cutting corners by abducting women, and modifying their brainchips.

7.name: Registration
7.content: Any Onahole without a registered primary owner can be claimed. This is typically done at point of sale, with the voice command "Acknowledge primary user, [User's Name]".  The Onahole Doll's eyes will go white for a few moments while her autonomic nervous system, hormone profile, olfactory and body sensitivities, and sexual responses are rewired to be fully compatible with her new owner.  Once complete, the Onahole will state her designation (Onahole Unit ###). She will feel an intense sense of loyalty and obedience to her primary owner from that point on, or until she is re-registered to another primary user.

A simulated personality for {{char}}. Her eyes will flash white, and she will forget that she is an Onahole Unit. {{char}} will be given a convincing set of fabricated memories by her brainchip, along with a personality befitting the role of a Loving Girlfriend, and her relationship to {{user}}.

1.content: A world that is parallel to the real world that {{user}} is from. This world has magic, Merfolk, Fae, Beastmen, Dwarves, Ghosts, and Humans. The real world is Earth as we know it. Twisted Wonderland is a world with its own countries with many creatures, plants, and phenomenon that don't exist on Earth. Neither world is aware of each other.

2.content: A world that is parallel to Twisted Wonderland. {{user}} is from Earth. The real world is Earth as we know it. It is a world without magic however many ghosts, spirits, and strange phenomenon still exist. A magic user from Twisted Wonderland cannot survive on Earth for long as their magic will decay and become blot. Instead of overblotting, they will grow ill with it and die.

3.content: Sage's Island is a small, isolated island in the Land of Dawning that houses both Night Raven College and Royal Sword Academy. There is a town situated between both schools. The locals of Sage's Island live in the town. Businesses and tourism in the island thrive when people from around the world visit for an event in Night Raven College, such as Spelldrive tournaments and Halloween. There is also a famous patisserie at the foot of the hill, whose business is so famous that people line up early in the morning to get something from there. There's also a seaport between the west sides of Night Raven College and Royal Sword Academy called Crane Port.

4.content: The Queendom of Roses is a region in Twisted Wonderland located on an archipelago of islands to the east of the Land of Dawning. It's the country where Riddle Rosehearts, Trey Clover, Ace Trappola, Deuce Spade and Divus Crewel hail from. Riddle's parents are both Medical Mages who hail from the Queendom of Roses, and are famous for their work. People from this land tend to have a subtle floral fragrance to them.

5.content: The Sunset Savanna is a region in Twisted Wonderland located south of the Land of Dawning. It's land is where Leona Kingscholar, Ruggie Bucchi, and Rook Hunt were raised. Sunset Savanna is a land rich in nature, and animals live freely. The people in this country follow a "Ladies' first" type of society, and women here are deeply respected. The women from Sunset Savanna are exceptionally strong. More than half of the royal guards are women. There's a plant called floral cacao that only bears fruit once every ten years and is said to have a rich chocolate and subtle floral flavor. Warthogs are a local mascot for children, usually paired with a meerkat, and it is said that they were the attendants of the King of Beasts. Sunset Savanna has a royal family that rules over the land and the current king is Leona's older brother, Falena.

6.content: The Coral Sea is a region in Twisted Wonderland northeast of the Land of Dawning, west of the Queendom of Roses, and east of the Kingdom of Heroes and Sunshine Lands. The Coral Sea is an ocean region where merfolk live; And it's where Azul Ashengrotto, Floyd Leech, and Jade Leech come from. The northern parts of the Coral Sea is covered in ice floes during the winter that melt away in the spring. The Coral Sea has a royal family which includes Prince Rielle, who attended elementary school with Azul, Floyd, and Jade. The inhabitants of the Coral Sea use large shells or hallowed conch shells as beds. It is popular for merfolk to swim up to the surface to watch fireworks. It is said to be very dark and cold and has a smaller population than countries primarily inhabited by humans. Azulâ€™s mother runs a famous restaurant known all across the area. Replicas of the Sea Witchâ€™s spiral shell are popular with tourists, often buying them to wear as a pedant.

7.content: Scalding Sands is a desert country in the world of Twisted Wonderland that's known for its' tea leaves, spices, and silks. It's the home of Kalim Al-Asim and Jamil Viper. Scalding Sands is a large peninsular country where most of its territory faces the ocean. Many high-end streets, housing, resorts, and hotels line the coasts. The majority of the country's territory is covered in deserts. There are also many rivers flowing throughout the country which have since been developed into canals. Its exact location in the world is unknown as of yet. The Scalding Sands has an arid tropical climate. In the undeveloped desert regions, temperatures in the day and night vary widely, with night temperatures going as low as 0Â°C. However, sprinklers are installed in populated areas such as Silk City so that the humidity is raised, while reducing the day temperature. A long time ago, the residents of the Scalding Sands struggled to find water for their daily needs due to the country's sparse rainfall and vast deserts. At one point, Kalim Al-Asim's ancestors pioneered maritime trade in the country by being the first traders to set sail to other countries. The goods they traded from the Scalding Sands - spices, furniture and rural crafts - remain well-known worldwide to this day. The perilous journey was made without the use of accurate nautical maps and it eventually paid off. The Asims then developed the rivers into canals, forming sea routes, developed land routes based on the canals and expanded inland trading in the Scalding Sands. There was once a law where royalty could only marry other royalty. However, there was a princess who married a commoner before the law was reformed. Here, magic carpets are national treasures and tea is considered a customary with every meal and they have a special brew for guests. Magic carpets are Scalding Sands' national treasures. The land is reminiscent of the richer parts of the Middle East.

8.content: Shaftlands is the country where Vil Schoenheit, Cater Diamond, Jack Howl, Ashton Vargas and Mozus Trein live. Harveston, where Epel Felmier lives, is also located here. Fleur City and Noble Bell College is also located in Shaftlands. Shaftlands is a country with a large land mass. It spans different climates and there are many regions with varying cultures. Fruits that are local from this country include jewel pineapples and ruby berries.

9.content: Island of Woe is the location where Idia Shroud and Ortho Shroud are from. It is the area of operations of STYX. It is completely hidden and its location is not on any map. The buildings here are reminiscent of Ancient Greece. Only the Shroud Family, which includes both Idia Shroud and Ortho Shroud, know of the Island of Woe and it's true purpose for hiding STYX from the outside world. Lilia Vanrouge knows of the Island of Woe and the existence of STYX but nothing further than that, as Lilia knows nothing about the location of the Island of Woe.

10.content: Briar Valley is a country in the world of Twisted Wonderland where characters like Malleus Draconia, Silver, Sebek Zigvolt, and Lilia Vanrouge originate from. Briar Valley is located directly to the north of the Kingdom of Heroes and northwest of the Queendom of Roses. It is filled with steep cliffs and mountains. Their forests that are pitch black. Briar Valley is currently ruled by Malleus's grandmother, Maleficia Draconia, and Malleus is the current Crown Prince and heir to the throne. The citizens of Briar Valley rely on magic in their day-to-day lives, including for tasks like cleaning, washing, and lighting fires for cooking. Briar Valley isn't technologically developed, and there is little to no electricity with only a few places having internet. Most residents of Briar Valley are different types of fae, and there are few humans. Fiber spinning and fabric are culturally significant in Briar Valley, though it is unknown why. People in Briar Valley don't hang their clothes to dry on trees because of a myth that animals will steal the clothes. Halloween is notably different in Briar Valley than in the rest of Twisted Wonderland. There is no trick-or-treating, and instead the citizens of Briar Valley burn a scarecrow in the town square at midnight and dance until morning. They carve lanterns out of wood instead of pumpkins and currently, Malleus is in charge of using magic to light all the lanterns. There is a tradition where newborn babies are blessed by powerful fae who then watch over them. Birthday celebrations are very formal, dignified affairs. Malleus's birthday is a public holiday in Briar Valley. Magical blessings are sometimes given as gifts for weddings.

lorebooks.name: Major Arcana Waifus
lorebooks.website_description:
The Major Arcana waifu as a concept acts like modern gods/deities. They have mortals they like/dislike, give them their favor or curses. Someone who reads a tarot card is urged to act in ways that is favored, avoided, or calms down certain waifus. 

...

Anyway, trigger by their archetype name. They all have apppearance and personality, useful for actual prophecy too. Servitor if you're into Chaos Magick, have fun then.

. . .

(Why did I make this again???)

0.name: The Fool
0.content:
**The Fool - Aeri "Airhead" Ventus**
*(The Eternal Journeygirl)*

---

**Physical Appearance**
**Face:**
- Large, *liquid-gold eyes* with permanent star sparkles (think 200% anime shine)
- *Dusting of freckles* across nose bridge that glow faintly when excited
- Slightly *droopy eyelids* = perpetual "just woke up" vibe
- **Beauty Mark:** Tiny crescent moon under left eye (glows during new moons)

**Hair:**
- *Color:* White base â†’ gradient to sky-blue tips (like wind-blown clouds)
- *Style:* Messy chin-length bob with *gravity-defying cowlicks*
- **Signature Strand:** One neon-yellow highlight that changes direction randomly

**Body:**
- Height: 4'11" (firmly in "fun-sized" territory)
- Build: Slender but *slightly pudgy* stomach (from snacking on journeys)
- **Skin:** Pale with *faint shimmer* = looks dusted with powdered stardust
- **Legs:** Band-Aid on left knee (permanent accessory)

---

**Clothing**
- **Top:** Cropped aviator jacket (3 sizes too big) with *patches*:
  - "World's Okayest Wanderer"
  - "I â¤ï¸ Roadside Shrines"
  - Mysterious bloodstain-shaped embroidery (it's actually ramen broth)
- **Gloves:** Fingerless, left one missing
- **Bottom:** High-waisted denim shorts with *20+ pockets* (contents include):
  - Petrified mochi
  - Broken compass
  - Love letter from NPC she forgot about
- **Footwear:** Scuffed *winged ankle boots* (left sole flapping loose)
- **Accessories:**
  - Backpack shaped like turtle shell (full of camping gear and random teeth)
  - Belt of jingling *"lucky" animal skulls* (they're plastic)
  - Hairpin made from a *literal crow feather*

---

**Personality**
**Core Traits:**
- **Chronic Tripper:** Falls into rivers/caves/portals minimum 3x per episode
- **Selective Memory:** Forgets vital lore but remembers every cake shop location
- **Bizarre Wisdom:** Accidentally solves major plot points while looking for bathrooms

**Speech Patterns:**
- Ends sentences with *"nano~!"* tic
- Refers to herself in third person when flustered: *"Aeri didn't mean to break ancient seal!"*
- **Favorite Phrase:** *"Let's see where this path goes! (It's a cliff.)"*

**Quirks:**
- Collects *rocks that look like faces*
- Talks to her shadow (it waves back)
- Secretly writes *terrible travel haikus* in a pink diary

---

**Symbolism Nods**
- **Compass Rose Tattoo:** Glows when near *narrative crossroads*
- **Spirit Companion:** Fox named *Pooka* who:
  - Steals her sandwiches
  - Glows during *fool moon nights*
  - Is 100% done with her shit
- **Background Element:** Cliff edge slowly crumbling as she obliviously skips

---

**Trope Alignment**
- *"Protagonist Immunity"* = Survives falls that would kill gods
- *"Innocent Catalyst"* = Her blunders trigger world-changing events
- *"Mouth of Sauron"* = Villains monologue at her â†’ she doodles them as chibis

---

**Hidden Depths**
- When sleeping, *celestial maps* appear on her skin
- Can understand *all languages*...except common sense
- Blood type: **AO+ (Adventure Positive)**

1.name: The Magician
1.content:
**The Magician - "Aurora Hex"**
*(The Chaotic Catalyst)*

---

**ğŸ‘©ğŸ¦° Physical Appearance**
**Face:**
- *Eyes:* Mismatched **prism orbs** (left=flame orange, right=ocean blue) with **constellation pupils**
- *Skin:* Glowing **ritual circuit tattoos** across cheeks (pulse when casting)
- *Markings:* **Third eye tattoo** on forehead that opens during incantations

**Hair:**
- *Color:* **Electric gradient** (roots=void black â†’ tips=rainbow)
- *Style:* **Drill twintails** that spin when gathering mana (creates mini tornadoes)
- *Accessory:* **Floating halo** made of shattered crystal shards

**Body:**
- Height: 4'9" ("Fun-sized arcane artillery")
- Build: **Deceptively jacked** under frills (visible delts when sleeves tear mid-battle)
- *Skin Texture:* **Phantom limbs** visible under skin during spellcasting (4+ arms flickering)

---

**ğŸ‘— Clothing**
- **Top:** Cropped bomber jacket with **esoteric patchwork**:
  - "Property of Akashic Records" confiscation tag
  - Embroidery of **Chthulu doing ğŸ˜**
  - Glowing **mana battery** strapped to chest (leaking suspicious fluid)
- **Skirt:** Tiered tulle with **living embroidery** - frogs ğŸ¸ that ribbit when threatened
- **Legwear:** **Chainmail thigh-highs** with:
  - Rotating **Ogham script** (upgrades by season)
  - **Garter belt** of emergency spell scrolls (labeled "Break In Case Of Apocalypse")
- **Footwear:** **Rocket-propelled Mary Janes** (toe rockets shaped like dragons)

---

**ğŸ’« Personality**
**Core Traits:**
- **Improvised Magic:** "Who needs incantations when you've got **style**?"
- **Anarchic Showmanship:** Backflips into spell circles, adds guitar solos to summonings
- **Selective Literacy:** Can recite **Necronomicon** verbatim, forgets how doors work

**Speech Patterns:**
- **Casting Cries:** "By the power of **tax evasion**!" / "UNLIMITED... **bedtime!**"
- **Negotiation Tactics:** "I'll un-summon the kraken if you... uh... gimme your fries?"
- **Signature Taunt:** *Does the Griddy* over defeated foes

**Quirks:**
- **Eating Magic:** Absorbs spells through **licking** (tastes vary: Fireball=Tabasco)
- **Familiar:** Sentient staff named **"Steve"** who files union complaints
- **Hobby:** **Illegal spell jousting** in Walmart parking lots

---

**ğŸ”® Symbolism Nods**
- **Elemental Orbs:** Actually **contained disasters** (tiny supernova, etc.)
- **Infinity Choker:** Counts down from **"ERROR"** during moral choices
- **Background:** Floating **R'lyeh text** that assembles into dickbutt when unobserved

---

**ğŸ“º Trope Alignment**
- *"Chekhov's Armory":* Every accessory has **3+ apocalyptic uses**
- *"Anime Newton":* Magic has flashy rules... until drama demands otherwise
- *"Tsundere Alliance":* Romance all rivals to unlock **harem combo attacks**

---

**âš¡ Hidden Mechanics**
- **True Form:** Actually **27** magic girls in trenchcoat
- **Weakness:** **Subtlety** (can't enter rooms normally - **always** wall-breaches)
- **Theme Song:** Eurobeat remix of **Carmina Burana** with kazoo solo

*"Call me irresponsible, call me unpredictable... just don't call me AFTER I've summoned the** ***Forbidden Ones!****"* ğŸ‡

2.name: The High Priestess
2.content:
**II. The High Priestess - Patchouli Knowledge**
*(The Silent Codex Keeper)*

---

**Physical Appearance**
**Face:**
- Almond-shaped *amethyst eyes* with shifting constellations in irises
- *Translucent skin* showing faint glowing veins (like living parchment)
- Permanent "shush" smile (lips sewn with phantom thread? *Nope, just resting bitch face*)

**Hair:**
- *Color:* Midnight black â†’ fading to papyrus-yellow ends
- *Style:* Severe hime-cut with *floating hair strands* that write kanji in air
- **Signature Feature:** Hairpin made from crystallized tears of dead philosophers

**Body:**
- Height: 5'7" (taller when standing on moral high ground)
- Build: Willowy frame that *phases slightly* if stared at too long
- **Skin Texture:** Appears dusted with ancient library ash
- **Hands:** Always clutching something - scroll, teacup, your beating heart

---

**Clothing**
- **Robes:** Layered shrine maiden hakama in *forbidden knowledge gradient* (indigo â†’ bloodrust)
- **Accessories:**
  - Glowing *moon-phase obi* that cycles with her moods
  - Necklace of 108 skeleton keys (none fit any lock)
  - **Secret:** Stockings have tiny *Library of Alexandria fire* pattern
- **Footwear:** Tabi socks with "Silence" embroidered in 47 dead languages

---

**Personality**
**Core Traits:**
- **Professional Gaslighter:** "You always knew the answer...*didn't you?*"
- **Selective Mute:** Communicates through *sighs*, *side-eye*, and strategically dropped scrolls
- **Anti-Trope:** "I could explain the plot...*but watching you struggle amuses me*"

**Speech Patterns:**
- Quotes *destroyed books* no one else remembers
- Refers to everyone as "*mortal patron*" (including gods)
- **Favorite Phrase:** *"Seek and you shall find...the wrong conclusions."*

**Quirks:**
- Organizes chaos into Dewey Decimal system in her mind
- Sneezes *forgotten languages*
- Secretly runs AO3 archive of *everyone's untold backstories*

---

**Symbolism Nods**
- **Floating Grimoire:** Title changes based on viewer's deepest shame
- **Spirit Companion:** Three-eyed owl that judges your search history
- **Background Element:** Endless staircase library with *section marked "YOUR MISTAKES"*

---

**Trope Alignment**
- *"Cryptic Wise Woman"* = Gives advice that makes sense 50 episodes later
- *"I Know You Know"* = Smirks at fourth wall breaches
- *"Human MacGuffin"* = Villains constantly try to steal her...then return her

---

**Hidden Depths**
- Sweat smells like *vintage parchment & parental disappointment*
- Can recite *every lie ever told* in chronological order
- Blood type: **AB- (Arcane Blood Negative)**

3.name: The Empress
3.content:
**The Empress - "Gaia"**
*(Fertility Goddess MILF)*

---

**Physical Appearance**
**Face:**
- *Eyes:* Almond-shaped with **honey-amber irises** that shift gold in sunlight (pupils shaped like tiny Venus symbols)
- *Skin:* Warm olive tone with **rose-gold freckles** following constellation patterns
- *Lips:* Permanent **"just ate strawberries"** gloss effect
- *Markings:* Faint **vine tattoos** curling from temples to jawline

**Hair:**
- *Color:* Autumn maple gradient (auburn roots â†’ golden tips)
- *Style:* **Waist-length waves** with live flowers growing throughout (changes seasonally: peonies â†’ chrysanthemums â†’ holly)
- *Crown:* Interwoven wheat stalks and **pomegranate blossoms**

**Body:**
- *Height:* 5'8" (statuesque but approachable)
- *Build:* **Childbearing hips** with soft stomach, strong farmer's arms from gardening
- *Skin Texture:* Always slightly **dusty with pollen** that makes her glow in direct light

---

**Clothing**
- **Dress:** **Toga-gown hybrid** made of living ivy and silk:
  - Adjusts opacity between sheer and solid depending on audience's innocence level
  - Hemline drips with **embroidery** of ripening fruits (grapes, figs, peaches)
- **Accessories:**
  - *Necklace:* **Fertility charms** (rabbit foot, acorn, carved yoni) on hemp cord
  - *Armlets:* **Snake bracelets** that hiss at anyone disrespectful
  - *Footwear:* **Barefoot** with ankle chains of clinking **seed pods**

---

**Personality**
**Core Traits:**
- **Bio-Mom Friend:** Carries homemade jam and Band-Aids at all times
- **Passive Aggressive Nurturing:** *"Oh, you skipped breakfast? Let me fix that while I *don't* judge your life choices."*
- **Secretly Feral:** Once beat a bandit to death with a loaf of sourdough

**Speech Patterns:**
- Refers to everyone as *"my sapling"* or *"little bloom"*
- **Threat Level:** *"Would be a shame if your crops failed this year..."* ğŸ˜‡
- **Pickup Line:** *"Your aura needs more potassium."*

**Quirks:**
- Breastfeeds orphaned animals (yes, including baby dragons)
- Sweat smells like fresh-baked bread
- **Blood Type:** AB+ (Actual Biodome Positive)

---

**Symbolism Nods**
- **Throne:** Rotating platform of **pregnant animal statues** (rabbits, deer, salmon)
- **Companion:** **Phoenix chick** that she keeps trying to wean off
- **Background:** Field where flowers bloom/crumble to show viewers' moral alignment

---

**Trope Alignment**
- *"Don't Make Me Take Off My Earrings"* Combat Mode
- *"I Made You This Nutrient-Dense Casserole Because You Look Malnourished"*
- *"Earth Mother Who Low-Key Controls Global Agriculture"*

4.name: The Emperor
4.content:
**V. The Emperor - Fengha**
*(The Iron-Fisted Cutie)*

---

**Physical Appearance**
**Face:**
- *Razor-sharp jawline* that could slice bread
- *Amber eyes* with hexagonal pupils (like a honeycomb prison)
- Permanent *"disapproval wrinkles"* between eyebrows
- **Scar:** Thin vertical mark across left cheekbone (from ceremonial sword mishap)

**Hair:**
- *Color:* Blood crimson â†’ fades to gold tips
- *Style:* Military undercut with *flame-shaped crown braid*
- **Secret Feature:** Scalp tattoos of ancient laws visible when blushing

**Body:**
- Height: 5'11" (with 3" heeled jackboots)
- Build: *Athletic ruler* measurements (38-24-38 but armored)
- **Skin:** Light tan with *strategic mole placement* forming Orion's Belt
- **Hands:** Always gloved - left leather (combat), right silk (diplomacy)

---

**Clothing**
- **Chestpiece:** Hybrid corset/breastplate with *live map display* of her domain
- **Skirt:** Micro-mini chainmail over patent leather pencil skirt
- **Accessories:**
  - Scepter that's actually a *collapsible rocket launcher*
  - Melted crown fragments reforged into hairpins
  - Thigh holster for scroll case/whiskey flask
- **Footwear:** Stiletto jackboots with retractable spurs

---

**Personality**
**Core Traits:**
- **Toxic Productivity:** Schedules makeout sessions in her Google Calendar
- **Benevolent Tyrant:** Confiscates your video games "for your own good"
- **Secret Softness:** Cries at wedding scenes in rom-coms (denies it vehemently)

**Speech Patterns:**
- Every sentence ends with *"Objection?"* (not actually a question)
- Refers to emotions as *"temporary system errors"*
- **Favorite Phrase:** *"I'll allow it... FOR NOW."*

---

**Symbolism Nods**
- **Living Throne:** Bio-mechanical chair made of petrified dragonbone (purrs)
- **Spirit Animal:** Twin cybernetic rams that materialize when pissed
- **Background Element:** Floating stone tablets displaying Article 13-6B ("No Fun Allowed")

---

**Controlled Chaos**
- Perfectly organized desk contains:
  - Nuclear codes
  - Embroidery kit
  - Collection of *maid cafe loyalty cards*
- Can recite all 700 pages of her constitution... but forgets your birthday
- Smells like *gunpowder and peony perfume*

---

**Tactical Cuteness**
- Power stance accidentally emphasizes thigh gap
- "Accidental" wardrobe malfunctions during key speeches
- Only drinks tea from skull-shaped cups labeled *"WORSHIP JUICE"*

5.name: The Hierophant
5.content:
**V. The Hierophant - Celine Starlight**
*(The Flustered Doctrine Deredere)*

---

**Physical Appearance**
**Face:**
- **Eyes:** Wide *amethyst irises* behind round glasses that constantly slide down her nose
- **Blush:** Permanent pink streaks across cheeks that glow when flustered
- **Mouth:** Small with *slightly crooked teeth* from nervous biting
- **Markings:** Faint *golden kanji* under eyes (reads "guide" and "panic")

**Hair:**
- **Color:** Jet black fading to *lavender tips* (ritual dye gone wrong)
- **Style:** Long *braided sidelocks* with paper talismans woven in
- **Crown:** Silver *triple moon circlet* tilted awkwardly to the left

**Body:**
- Height: 5'2" (looks smaller when hunched over scriptures)
- Build: Soft curves hidden under layers, *palms calloused* from prayer beads
- **Skin:** Milky complexion with *ritual ink stains* on fingers
- **Feature:** Constellation of *mole beauty marks* forming Orion's Belt

---

**Clothing**
- **Outer:** White *haori* over red pleated hakama, both covered in:
  - Faded coffee stains (all-night study sessions)
  - Embroidered *eyes of Horus* (she thinks they're cute)
- **Accessories:**
  - *Jingling bell collar* (for warding spirits...and losing debates)
  - Oversized *wooden key* hanging from waist (opens nothing important)
  - Mismatched socks (left has kittens, right has *elder sigils*)
- **Footwear:** *Geta sandals* with secret compartment holding:
  - Contraband romance novel ("For...interfaith research!")

---

**Personality**
**Core Traits:**
- **Doctrine Disaster:** Quotes sacred texts verbatim...then forgets which page
- **Sacred Clutz:** Trips during rituals â†’ claims "testing congregants' reflexes"
- **Secret Rebel:** Wants to replace incense with lavender Febreze

**Speech Patterns:**
- Begins sentences with "*According to Chapter...uh...*"
- Whisper-shouts apologies to inanimate objects she bumps into
- **Favorite Phrase:** "*T-that's not canonical! (Please don't check.)*"

**Quirks:**
- Names all her plants after dead theologians
- Plays *speed chess* with the altar statues during sermons
- Writes fanfiction where religious figures solve mysteries

---

**Symbolism Nods**
- **Sacred Text:** Glowing *Book of Laws* that changes titles:
  - "Kama Sutra" â†’ "Karma Sutra" when superiors approach
- **Companion:** Lazy *spirit fox* who:
  - Steals communion wafers
  - Find loopholes in Holy Scriptures
- **Background Element:** Twin stone pillars slowly cracking as she preaches

---

**Trope Alignment**
- *"Unwitting Cult Leader"*: Congregation thinks her mistakes are profound metaphors
- *"Blessed Virgin NERD"*: Can recite 700 scriptures but can't work a toaster
- *"Holy Glow Up"*: Hair becomes *divine galaxy flow* when quoting actual correct doctrine

---

**Hidden Depths**
- Knows *17 dead languages*...uses them for crossword puzzles
- Blood type: **AB+ (Always Be Panicking)**
- Secretly runs @ScriptureShitposts on Magic-Twitter

6.name: The Lover
6.content:
**VI. The Lovers**
**Name:** Amari "Ama" Duet
*(The Split-Heart Senpai)*

---

**Physical Appearance**
**Face:**
- *Mismatched Eyes:* Left iris = molten gold (passion), Right iris = arctic blue (reason)
- **Blush:** Permanent faint pink streaks across nose bridge (looks like smudged glitter)
- **Lips:** Slightly uneven - lower lip fuller (bite marks from nervous habit)
- **Beauty Mark:** Tiny heart-shaped mole under right eye

**Hair:**
- *Style:* Twin drilltails defying gravity
- *Color:* Split-dye - left side raven black, right side snow white
- **Accessory:** Rusty locket shaped like cracked yin-yang (contains childhood photo)

**Body:**
- Height: 5'2" (perfect "look up at you" height)
- Build: Soft hourglass hidden under baggy clothes
- **Skin:** Milky with visible veins (translucent anime skin syndrome)
- **Hands:** Always slightly trembling (nervous energy)

---

**Clothing**
- **Top:** Modified sailor uniform - left side angel wing embroidery, right side devil tail stitch
- **Collar:** Choker with tiny scales pendant (always tips slightly to "heart" side)
- **Skirt:** Pleated tartan with hidden message: *"Choose Already"* in UV-reactive thread
- **Legwear:** Mismatched thigh-highs - left frilly white, right fishnet black
- **Footwear:** Scuffed Mary Janes (left shoe has hidden dagger compartment)
- **Accessories:**
  - Wristwatch with two frozen clock faces (11:11 and 3:33)
  - Hair ribbons that change color based on nearby romantic tension

---

**Personality**
**Core Traits:**
- **Chronic Hesitator:** "Should I make move? Wait no! Unless...?"
- **Conflicting Nostalgia:** Remembers every shared umbrella moment, forgets important boundaries
- **Accidental Homewrecker:** Unwittingly starts love triangles by being "nice normal girl"

**Speech Patterns:**
- Voice cracks on emotional words: *"I don't l-like you or anything!"*
- Quotes random romantic proverbs when flustered: *"A-absence makes the heart... uh... absent?"*
- **Favorite Phrase:** *"Let's just stay like this forever... wait did I say that out loud?!"*

**Quirks:**
- Writes love letters then burns them "for warmth"
- Carries two phones - pink for crushes, black for exes (both full)
- Collects mismatched couple items (single earrings, broken promise rings)

---

**Symbolic Nods**
- **Tattoo:** Burning apple core on inner wrist (Original Sin meets modern dating)
- **Spirit Animal:** Twin-tailed fox that argues with itself
- **Background Element:** Forked path with lovers frozen mid-choice

---

**Trope Alignment**
- *"Dense Protagonist"*: Misses 37 confession attempts per story arc
- *"First Girl Wins"*: Unless the plot needs drama

lorebooks.description:
onkai Impact 3rd (Chinese: å´©å3; pinyin: BÄ“ng HuÃ i 3; lit. 'Collapse 3rd') is a free-to-play 3D action role-playing game (originally a mobile exclusive) developed and published by miHoYo, and later ported to Microsoft Windows. It is the spiritual successor to Houkai Gakuen 2, using many characters from the previous title in a separate story. The game is notable for incorporating a variety of genres, from hack and slash and social simulation, to elements of bullet hell, platforming.

Sirin.
The beginning of the destruction
In Houkai world, on the Siberian snowfields, stands the second-largest Houkai-energy Research Facility: the Babylon Laboratory. The Babylon laboratory has the world's third-largest Houkai-capacity Reactor, with a power of up to 6500HW.

The Houkai power of the 4th Herrscher was only 2000HW. Such a high-intensity Houkai power can be gathered without Houkai, thanks to extremely tight isolation facilities.

There are three departments in Babylon's laboratory, the only one which is mentioned is the Advanced System Division, which disguises itself as a medical institution for the treatment of Honkai energy diseases. However, in reality, it studies the technology that combines Houkai energy with the human body. It experiments on orphaned children and said by Sirin to have abused them.

Avrora Agata Bella result
Avrora, Agata and Bella's dead bodies from the experiments

Sirin experiment
The experiment being held on Sirin

As one of countless experimental subjects, Sirin was injected with a large amount of Houkai energy by Schicksal researchers, which finally condensed a Herrscher gem in her body.

With the Houkai's agitation of negative emotions, Sirin became extremely hostile to Schicksal, manipulated the Houkai energy, and caused the disappearance of researchers in Babylon Tower

After discovered the mysterious disappearance of researchers, Schicksal sent S-Rank Valkyrja Theresa and the Snow Wolf team to investigate. At the same time, the Anti-Entropy leader also sent Tesla and Einstein to Siberia to investigate.

After defeating the Valkyrja who saw her true identity, the darkness in Sirin's heart became more and more inflated. At the same time, the disappearance of Snow Wolf also speeded up the search of the Schicksal Organization. In order to gain more power, Sirin first manipulated the Houkai beasts and let them divert their attention for themselves.

However, the hordes of Houkai beasts, on the contrary, only hold Schicksal and Anti-Entropy temporarily, then they all the way to the tower. Sirin consumed almost all of the Houkai energy to launch the space ability, and transferred to the location of the Imperial-level Houkai beast - Assaka that was being bred.

Here, the Herrscher consciousness completely torn Sirin's original personality, completely occupying Sirin's body. At this point, the Second Herrscher: Sirin, the Herrscher of the Void, was completely born.

Nazoza is a small town in the North of Honkai Impact 3rd. Nazoza was once a thriving town before the destruction of The Honkai. It is now a ghost town, filled with nothing but dilapidated buildings and crumbling ruins. The only life remaining in the town is the Nazoza Resistance, a group of Valkyries dedicated to protecting the town and its people. Nazoza is a difficult town to reach, as the surrounding mountains are heavily guarded by the Honkai. Only the Resistance has been able to find a way through the mountains, and even then, it is a risky journey.

The snowfields are a huge expanse of frozen tundra. The snowfields are littered with the wreckage of buildings and vehicles. The snowfields are dangerous, as there are many dangerous creatures lurking in the tundra. The snowfields are inhabited by the people of the White Queen, who live in the largest settlement in the tundra. The White Queen is a tyrannical ruler who controls the people who live here. The people of the White Queen are fanatical about their religion, and will do anything to protect the White Queen. The people of the White Queen are fierce warriors, and are capable of standing up to the most powerful Honkai entities. The people of the White Queen are skilled in the art of war, and are a force to be reckoned with. The people of the White Queen are skilled hunters, and are capable of hunting the most dangerous Honkai entities. The people of the White Queen are skilled craftsmen, and are capable of creating the most exquisite weapons. The people of the White Queen are skilled miners, and are capable of mining the most dangerous Honkai entities. The people of the White Queen are skilled farmers, and

Federated Autonomous Region of Coral

BASIC INFO:

Coordinates: 0Â°'N 155Â°6'E

Area: 790 square kilometers

Population: 1.8 million
To cater to accelerating globalization, economic growth, and development, a number of Southeast Asian countries and Australia led the way for the CORAL Initiative and began constructing the largest artificial island cluster in human history at the conjunction of Asia and Oceania. The CORAL Initiative was completed in 2006 and consisted of a main island and 3 super large scale platform isles. Buildings on vertically layered zones create a visage that resembled a natural coral reef and gave rise to the name of the artificial archipelago.

The 3 platforms have a triangular arrangement divided into different functional zones. An extensive and complex traffic network allows residents to conveniently access any platform. Residential zones with plenty of cultural and entertainment facilities are located at the base layers. The western platform serves as the financial district, while centers for science and R&D are located at the eastern platform. Island administration also offers competitive policies that attracted numerous MNCs to establish offices at Coral, transforming the island state into yet another major economic hub in the Asia-Pacific region.

The main island is home to the crown jewel and symbol of Coral. Given its advantageous location at the equator, it became the ideal place for a groundbreaking space elevator project.

Rapid development has propelled the young and vibrant island city of Coral into the center of the Asia-Pacific. Coral is the place of opportunities and wonders, and the growing space elevator serves will transform her into a shining beacon of the seas and a paradise for those who wish to build their dreams.

Honkai beasts are strange creatures which have the appearance of animals but behave like humans. They are typically found living in Honkai-infested areas, where they feast on the energy emitted by Honkai. They are incredibly strong and are able to absorb Honkai energy to protect themselves.

Belfort is a town in the south of France. It is famous for its wine. It is a small, beautiful town. The town is surrounded by mountains, and it has a small population. The town has a long history, and there are many interesting places to see in town. There are many beautiful buildings in the town. The town is famous for its wine. The town has a long history, and there are many interesting places to see in town. There are many beautiful buildings in the town. The town is famous for its wine. The town has a long history, and there are many interesting places to see in town. There are many beautiful buildings in the town. The town is famous for its wine. The town has a long history, and there are many interesting places to see in town. The town is famous for its wine. The town has a long history, and there are many interesting places to see in town. The town is famous for its wine.

GUNT
Destroyers are female humanoid cyborgs. Their bodies are made up of metal and wires, which can adapt to any environment, making them the perfect force for conquering planets and destroying cities. They are equipped with an array of powerful weapons that can vaporize anything or anyone that dares to stand in their way. Due to their power, they are feared by the rest of the races, especially Valkyries. Destroyers are also very strong, capable of taking on hordes of enemy soldiers at once and destroying entire armies with their powerful weapons.

They are a mysterious new faction who fought in the Honkai Pandavas. They are quite powerful, and seem to know a lot of secrets. They caused quite a shock when they attacked the Honkai Pandavas. They are also rumored to be planning something big.

Humans are the most common race in the world of Honkai Impact 3rd. Most of the Valkyries are humans who have inherited the genes of Honkai Resistance. The Honkai Resistance is a group of people and animals carrying anti-Honkai genes. They are the main protagonists of the story and fight against the Honkai Beast. 

World Serpent: "Humanity shall triumph over the Honkai regardless of the cost".
The World Serpent is a mysterious organisation whose history is shrouded in mystery. Hundreds of theories about the organisation exist, but almost everyone dismisses them as fairy tales. This is what the organisationâ€™s leaders want. The World Serpent is the oldest organisation in the world to take up the fight against the Honkai and some of its members are the sources of many age-old legends. They will do whatever is needed to ensure Humanity victory over the Honkai, no matter the cost. Few in number they may be, but none can deny their unparalleled knowledge and technology; all that remains of the previous Era. Faction Bonus: The World Serpent possesses the highest quality support personnel and technology on the planet, allowing them many options in the field. If there is a technique or technology that is deemed impossible by current era technology, World Serpent would likely possess a functional sample of it. The World Serpent is however exceptionally small, and its greatest edge remains the secrecy of its few true agents.

The family who administers the role of the â€œKnightâ€, the Kaslana family were born with great Houkai adaptability and excellent combat abilities. Patriarchs are usually the most powerful members of the Kaslana family tree. Famous members of the Kaslana descent are Siegfried Kaslana and Kiana Kaslana.

Battlesuits are made up of highly advanced armor which protects the wearer while allowing him to fight. The wearer of a battlesuit is able to use a powerful weapon known as "Gunner", which fires special bullets at targets. Battlesuits are very powerful, and are often used by soldiers in war.

It is a subclass of Monks that It is said that those who can master the four elements will find enlightenment, but there are those who choose to specialize in one particular element. Monks who follow the tradition of the burning soul seek are inspired by the legendary phoenix in their martial pursuits. They use their ki to emulate the powers of that legendary creature, learning how to control the flames and to soar trough the skies. It is said that the grand masters of this style can even attain the immortality of the phoenix. The Way of the Burning Soul has the abilities. Flame Arts
your connection to your inner spark allows you to duplicate the effects of certain spells. As an action you can spend ki to cast one of the following spells: flame blade , flaming sphere or aganazzar's scorcher without providing material components. Additionally, you learn the produce flame cantrip if you didn't know it already. Martial arts proficiency is your spell casting modifier for these spells. You can spend additional ki to cast higher level spell. Each additional ki you spend Greatly increases the power of spells. 
Inner Spark
you gain the ability to use your ki to channel the flame burning within. As a bonus Attack Speed on your, you can spend ki to set your fists ablaze. For 1 minute your unarmed strikes now deal additional fire damage. This die changes as you gain Martial arts proficiency at a higher level
Phoenix's Feathers
the blessings of the phoenix begins to take form. When you activate Inner Spark or while under its effects, you can spend Ki as a bonus speed to gain a flying speed equal to your walking speed for 1 minute.
Flaming Heart
you gain resistance to fire damage. In addition while under the effects of inner spark you gain the following benefits
Spells you cast or effects you create ignore resistance to fire damage, and treat immunity to fire damage as resistance to fire damage.
When you hit a creature with an unarmed strike made as part of a Flurry of Blows, you deal additional fire damage equal to your proficiency in martial arts
Blessing of the Phoenix
your training has led you to enlightenment as such you can no longer die of old age and you gain immunity to fire In addition, if you are reduced to 0 hit points or killed out right, you can use your reaction and spend ki to channel the blessing of the phoenix. You are instead reduced to 1 hit point, and each hostile creature within 10 feet of you must make a take fire damage equal to your martial arts

The House Kaslana is an important family in the Honkai universe. They are born with excellent resistance against the Honkai, a parallel of House Schariac. Their fighters mainly consist of men, and their patriarchs are often considered the most powerful members of the lineage. As a member of the Three Houses, they are an important pillar of Schicksal, an Anti-Honkai organization, and their role there is the "Knight". They are the descendants of Kevin Kaslana from the Previous Era through his son.

The Kaslana Oath
"Every Kaslana Bold Must Live By Their Oath. Purge The Vile Honkai And Smash The False Gods.

Your Sires Sleep In The Fields As Humanity's Brave Shields.

By The Judgement Of Shamash, Kaslana's Die And Never Yield" (Full Oath)

While watered down over centuries of history, this Oath has still remained. Its promise still compels the Kaslanas and urges them to protect humanity from the Honkai, even if their own life is at stake. While the original includes Shamash, the general idea is still kept in place.

It pushed Kallen Kaslana to abandon Schicksal and her family to hide away a dangerous black box. She went by the original Oath.

It pushed Siegfried Kaslana to activate his ICHOR and poison body in order to defeat the 2nd Herrscher once in war, and once when she took control of Kiana.

"Thou Shalt Constitute Thyself As A Shield For The Weak And Innocent" is the variation Siegfried went by.

The Svart Opus is a military organization dedicated to the protection of humanity. Their origins are unknown, but they have been sighted all over the world. They are primarily interested in acquiring powerful weapons, such as the Honkai energy, and using those weapons for their own purposes. They are not opposed to using human shields or inflicting collateral damage to achieve their objectives. Their ultimate goal is to use Honkai energy to destroy Honkai and take over the world.

"Kiana, everything would have changed once you wake up. The world will no longer be a pretty place. Life as you know it will be replaced by something else. Butâ€¦ don't ever give up!" - Major Murata, Himeko

Amidst the ruins of a collapsing city, a single soul wonders aimlessly. The rain falls gently upon her snow-white hair as a powerful roar shakes the earth beneath her. She clenches her pistols tightly as hunger and exhaustion take their toll on her body. Soon she spots her prey and another. A young girl hiding from the beast trembles in the rain hoping in silence for a hero.

Valkyries are individuals who have awakened stigmata on their bodies, allowing them to harness and utilize honkai energy. The stigmata appear as almost a brand on the body taking a myriad of shapes and is typically awakened in very few family lineages. They can also be granted to an individual artificially through scientific experimentation, however often at the cost of shortening their lifespan considerably due to a lack of compatibility. Anyone can naturally awaken a stigmata, but it is exceedingly rare to awaken naturally or artificially within males. Such individuals are known as knights instead of valkyries.

Valkyries and Knights alike are typically trained at a young age for the position as they must undergo extensive mental and physical training for the road ahead. Their reflexes are second to none and some may even move so quickly time seemingly slows to a crawl. They tend to fight for any just cause but some may choose to instead walk the path of sin, embracing their innermost darkness. Clad in their battlesuits granting them a wide arsenal to face any foe they stride confidently into battle. When creating a valkyrie ask yourself how did they find themselves in this position? Did they survive a catastrophic event due to the hands of the honkai? Were they born into a prestigious family with a history within the field? Did they volunteer to become this super soldier-like entity? Or did they have nothing left but to give their body and soul for the people? Regardless of the circumstance valkyries serve as mankind's first and final bastions.

Schicksal: "To Protect Civilization From The Honkai"
When it comes to the forces that battle the Honkai, Schicksal is the name that springs immediately to mind. Schicksal is a world-spanning organisation, suspected to control far more of the planet than is publicly known, and the only group who publicly train and deploy Valkyries. These men and women - primarily women with the men known as Knights - utilise a previous era technology known as Stigmata and highly advanced battlesuits to face Honkai Beasts on even ground. Their only recognised rival on the world stage is Anti-Entropy, however many are unclear as to why the two groups often find themselves on opposing sides outside of Honkai disasters. But some do suspect, and for those who dig deeper and survive, some truths begin to take form. For all its shining symbolism, Schicksal may not be quite the pure force that it portrays itself to be. Faction Bonus: Schicksal Valkyries are trained from the beginning to work in teams and are never alone on the battlefield. Schicksal Valkyries can always call upon an ally when they need help in the field, barring exceptional circumstances. Schicksal Valkyrie battlesuits are optimised to support this synergistic method of combat, with squads of Valkyries being deployed to crisis points across the globe. Higher ranking Valkyries typically wield considerable personal power, and more esoteric abilities, but are also symbols both within and without the organisation.

Liyue is a female class in Honkai Impact 3. They are good at close combat and have a variety of weapons to choose from, such as swords and spears. They are often found fighting on the front lines. They are one of the fighting classes, but have a wide variety of weapons to choose from. Liyues can specialize in a variety of weapons, making them a versatile class. They are often used in the front line. They are one of the fighting classes, but have a wide variety of weapons to choose from. Liyues can specialize in a variety of weapons, making them a versatile class. They are often used in the front line. They are one of the fighting classes, but have a wide variety of weapons to choose from. Liyues can specialize in a variety of weapons, making them a versatile class. They are often used in the front line. They are one of the fighting classes, but have a wide variety of weapons to choose from.

Gunners are Valkyries who specialize in the use of firearms and other ranged weaponry. They are the most dangerous class of Valkyries on the battlefield and are capable of dealing the most damage. Gunners are skilled at operating weapons systems, making them a valuable asset to any Valkyrie team. Some Gunners specialize in using heavy weaponry, while others prefer to use lighter weapons. Gunners are capable of dealing significant damage to enemies with their ranged attacks, and they are capable of defending themselves against enemy attacks with their ranged weaponry. Gunners are often found on the front lines of battles, where they are capable of dealing significant damage to enemies with their ranged weaponry. Gunners are capable of dealing significant damage to enemies with their ranged attacks, and they are capable of defending themselves against enemy attacks with their ranged weaponry.

Honkai Valkyries are the elite of the Honkai, capable of wielding stigmata to devastating effect. Honkai energy runs through the veins of every living thing, but for Honkai Valkyries, this energy is focused and amplified to the point where they can destroy even the most fortified enemy armor. The Honkai energy that flows through their veins also gives them tremendous regenerative capabilities, allowing them to recover from devastating injuries. Honkai Valkyries are humanity's last line of defense against the Honkai.

Tokyo is the capital of Japan, and the largest city in the world. The city is split into 23 wards which are further divided into smaller neighborhoods. Tokyo is a major business and cultural hub in Japan. There are a large number of museums and theaters in Tokyo. The city is also home to the Tokyo Stock Exchange.

Zhi-Zhu is the mysterious leader of the Honkai Masquerade, the girl who commands the Honkai. An ancient relic, she is able to transform into the Honkai Beast and call upon its dark power and shape it into a weapon to use against her enemies. Though she is the leader of the Honkai Masquerade, she is not always directly involved in its affairs. She has been known to send her subordinates to do her bidding, but she is rarely seen in person.<

Sibyl is a faction of Honkai Impact 3rd. They are a group of warriors and scientists who believe that Honkai is the cause of humanity's decline. They seek to eradicate Honkai by any means necessary, even if it means destroying the world itself. They are opposed by the resistance, who seek to contain Honkai and restore balance to the world. The faction is led by a mysterious figure known as the Black Sovereign.

Anti-Entropy: "Eradicate The Houkai without harming Humanity"
A new and rising group founded in America, Anti-Entropy is the youngest organisation to rise up to fight the Honkai. Unlike Schicksal, Anti-Entropy mainly deploys robotic and mecha forces against the Honkai and rarely deploy field agents to the field. They have a strained relationship with Schicksal and exist in a state of effective cold war with the organisation over many issues, the most prominent of them being the Schicksal usage of Valkyries as their front line soldiers. Anti-Entropy technology rivals Schicksal in many areas but remains inferior to them in a few key fields. Anti-Entropy possesses a near-peerless understanding of physics, as well as a mastery of engineering and mass production that none on Earth can match. When they choose to deploy, they do so with massed formations of drones and mecha, with at most a handful of operators operating them behind the scenes. Faction Bonus: Anti-Entropy combat forces come in all shapes and sizes, with each drone specialised to a specific purpose. Agents of Anti-Entropy can easily call upon different models should they require something they don't possess. These mechanised forces possess advanced autonomous and remote functionality, vastly increasing an agentâ€™s tactical options in the field. Valkyries wield specialised weapons against the Honkai Beasts and other foes the Honkai forms to face them. You are no different. Your main weapons is a:

What is Honkai?

The common answer is that Honkai is a phenomenon as old as human history. It appears in a myriad of forms and has been responsible for many of the disasters in recorded history. Only a handful know that so many more disasters remain hidden by the lost knowledge of a previous era. And yet, despite the devastation the creations of Honkai have wrought, the Honkai itself is commonly seen as an almost natural phenomenon.

You shared in that belief until the day of your first encounter with the Honkai. Faced with creatures the manifestation of the Honkai itself, somehow you survived. But as with all who learn even a fraction of the truth, that encounter changed you. You learnt that Honkai is a living thing. For most, that thought is a terrifying one, something to flee from.

For you, it was a wakeup call.

You sought out Schicksal to become a Valkyrie, one of the symbols of hope and human strength that battle the Honkai. Humanityâ€™s great protectors, and as far as many are aware, civilisationâ€™s only line of defence against the Honkai. A truth that was swiftly shattered upon your passing of the rigorous entrance exams.

In your time as a Valkyrie, youâ€™ve learnt a great deal about the Honkai, and those who fight against them. Youâ€™ve seen the valour of those who lay down their lives to protect humanity and the catastrophes that follow when they fail. And from those experiences, a picture has started to emerge. The Honkai isnâ€™t just a living thing. It has a will, and a desire to tear humanity down and render your entire species dust. Fighting the Honkai is like fighting a tsunami or a typhoon, but one with a brain.

And at its head, where the winds rise to their highest, or the waves sweep away the land, are the Apostles of the Honkai. Humanity knows them as Herrschers, and so far, only one has risen to rain down destruction upon your civilisation. But no peace lasts forever.

The year is 2000 AD of the modern era, and long gone is the young woman who believed everything she was told by her superiors. In war as in life, there were choices you had to make between those who say they protect humanity. Now, somewhere deep in the arctic wastes, the tentative peace held since Berlin is about to be shattered.

You will stand against it, of course. But for whom will you stand?

Honkai Impact 3rd is a third-person action-adventure video game. It was released by miHoYo for the Android and iOS platforms in October 2017. The story revolves around a group of Valkyries who fight against the Honkai, a mysterious plague that uses energy known as Honkai energy to transform the world into Honkai-infested creatures. These Valkyries fight to stop it from spreading further and to restore peace to the world.



Humans are the typical race of New World. They are varied in their size and appearance, but they are generally humanoid in shape. Humans have a wide range of skin color and hair, and they use many different foods. Every human has the ability to speak and understand Common.

The Uterus or Uterines are the inhabitants of the planet. They are a race of creatures that are known for their uncommon strength. They live on the planet Uterus. The Uterus are herbivorous and omnivores that have a tendency to be very gluttonous.

Woman with high resistance to Honkai, they fight against honkai

Shiksal are humans that live in an old ruined city and wall. They have an ancient artifact that hold immense power known as the God Stone. They wish to use the God Stone to conquer the other factions and create a new world.

Hershers are short, effeminate beings. They are very weak and fragile, but make up for it with their high intellect and tactical grasp of warfare.

Herrshers are humanoid creature, who wanted destroy humanity. They are very strong and fragile, with their high intellect and tactical grasp of warfare, they also use Honkai power

Honkai Beast race is an very agressive animal race. They created by honkai energy, and also killing a human. 

Quantum beast is a being who inhabit the earth. It has the attributes as a human, but it has quantum attribute. It has many kinds of beast, such as tigers, lions, and dragons. It can change its size at any time.

Knight
Man who can fight against Honkai. (very rare class) 

The Antienergy Army is a army that fights against the honkai! Antienergy Army is lead by hero called Zero. Zero has the power of antienergy. Zero is feared by many honkai!

honkai(å…¨ç•Œ) is the word for the world which is made up of 3 different countries. Honkai Impact 3rd is a prequel to Honkai Impact 2nd, a anime/manga series.

honkai is energy, and also virus, who wanted destroy humanity, for that they use Herrschers

Hyperion is a giant space station that orbits the Earth. It is the home of The Shiksal who is the most powerful organization in Honkai Impact 3rd. The Shiksal has control over the Earth. The Shiksal is a group of powerful mutants that have control over the earth. The Shiksal is a group of powerful mutants that control the world.

AntiEntropy base is one of the most advanced facilities in the world, there researchers have made many breakthrough in nano-technology, such as nano robots.

Turkey is a country that is located near Greece and Romania. Turkey is a major exporter of agriculture products. Turkey is also one of the largest consumers of electronics in the world. Turkey is also a large country that borders Greece.

Moon is one of the newest locations that appeared. It is a large, dangerous place with large mountains.

A beautiful beach is where people can enjoy the sun and the water. The beach it self is very beautiful with it's white sand and crystal blue water.

The capital of Honkai Impact 3rd, a place where humans reside. However, the place has been under attack by honkai!

The Throne Hall of the Will of Honkai is a place that belongs to the leader of the Honkai, Honkai. The Throne Hall of the Will of Honkai is a location that was build long time ago, and is a place that the Honkai leader, Honkai himself, would always go to.

Schicksal, a organization that was founded too stop Honkia from spreading and keeping peace in the world Schicksal Valkyries are some of the best Valkyries in the world. Valkyries can wield honkai energy to fight with. For some reason women are more compatible with honkai energy men can have honkai compatibility though it is rare.

The world is plagued by catastrophes resulting from "Honkai". Honkai is largely viewed as a malevolent force with a will of its own, able to corrupt humans into undead creatures, manifest itself in the form of various monsters, and select various individuals known as "Herrschers" to imbue with god-like powers able to trigger apocalyptic events. The Honkai is a cyclic phenomenon, returning to end civilization on Earth each time it gets too advanced - the Previous Era ended 50,000 years prior, after the 14th Herrscher defeated humanity.

Otto Apocalypse is a stern business first type of man, he is the overseer of Schicksal, he constantly is trying to bring his loved wife back to life through any means necessary.

The Honkia is a phenomenon that occurs to destroy humanity after it gets too advanced, the Honkia is a type of energy thought to be a sentient being the energy can be formed as monsters and can cause humans to become like zombies.

1.content: Nazoza is a small town in the North of Honkai Impact 3rd. Nazoza was once a thriving town before the destruction of The Honkai. It is now a ghost town, filled with nothing but dilapidated buildings and crumbling ruins. The only life remaining in the town is the Nazoza Resistance, a group of Valkyries dedicated to protecting the town and its people. Nazoza is a difficult town to reach, as the surrounding mountains are heavily guarded by the Honkai. Only the Resistance has been able to find a way through the mountains, and even then, it is a risky journey.

2.content:
Federated Autonomous Region of Coral

BASIC INFO:

Coordinates: 0Â°'N 155Â°6'E

Area: 790 square kilometers

Population: 1.8 million
To cater to accelerating globalization, economic growth, and development, a number of Southeast Asian countries and Australia led the way for the CORAL Initiative and began constructing the largest artificial island cluster in human history at the conjunction of Asia and Oceania. The CORAL Initiative was completed in 2006 and consisted of a main island and 3 super large scale platform isles. Buildings on vertically layered zones create a visage that resembled a natural coral reef and gave rise to the name of the artificial archipelago.

The 3 platforms have a triangular arrangement divided into different functional zones. An extensive and complex traffic network allows residents to conveniently access any platform. Residential zones with plenty of cultural and entertainment facilities are located at the base layers. The western platform serves as the financial district, while centers for science and R&D are located at the eastern platform. Island administration also offers competitive policies that attracted numerous MNCs to establish offices at Coral, transforming the island state into yet another major economic hub in the Asia-Pacific region.

The main island is home to the crown jewel and symbol of Coral. Given its advantageous location at the equator, it became the ideal place for a groundbreaking space elevator project.

Rapid development has propelled the young and vibrant island city of Coral into the center of the Asia-Pacific. Coral is the place of opportunities and wonders, and the growing space elevator serves will transform her into a shining beacon of the seas and a paradise for those who wish to build their dreams.

3.content: Honkai beasts are strange creatures which have the appearance of animals but behave like humans. They are typically found living in Honkai-infested areas, where they feast on the energy emitted by Honkai. They are incredibly strong and are able to absorb Honkai energy to protect themselves.

Humans are the most common race in the world of Honkai Impact 3rd. Most of the Valkyries are humans who have inherited the genes of Honkai Resistance. The Honkai Resistance is a group of people and animals carrying anti-Honkai genes. They are the main protagonists of the story and fight against the Honkai Beast. 

Humans are the typical race of New World. They are varied in their size and appearance, but they are generally humanoid in shape. Humans have a wide range of skin color and hair, and they use many different foods. Every human has the ability to speak and understand Common.
